This test is used to tell the difference between AT/RT and other brain tumors.",CancerGov,Childhood Central Nervous System Atypical Teratoid/Rhabdoid Tumor
What is the outlook for Childhood Central Nervous System Atypical Teratoid/Rhabdoid Tumor ?,Certain factors affect prognosis (chance of recovery)
